name: Suspicious Honey Char Siu
desc: A type of roasted meat from Liyue. Overly sweet seasoning makes for cloying torment of the tongue. As the local saying goes, a minute error can make a huge difference, and it seems that this holds true with cooking.

customize.name: Recipe: Honey Char Siu
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Honey Char Siu.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Honey Char Siu
customize.desc: A type of roasted meat from Liyue. As the name implies, the marinated meat skewered with a special metal fork is hung above the stove and roasted. The taste of freshly roasted Char Siu is a favorite of many a gourmand.

customize.name: Delicious Honey Char Siu
customize.desc: A type of roasted meat from Liyue. Richly red in color, aromatic, and intensely flavorful. Why, one might even faint from gluttony if one stares at it for too long. Between mouthfuls of delicious meat and rich sauce, one bowl of rice might seem too measly a match for this taste experience!

value.text: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.
